segments.text: Over on the left, there's quite a different situation unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A small boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, its legs are splayed out, almost ready to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching upward into an open cabinet, clearly aiming for something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ah, I see it nowâ€”it's a cookie jar, full of cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is already deep inside, grabbing the treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing next to him, reaching up with an open palm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly an accomplice, waiting eagerly for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together in this little secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's impressive how quietly they are going about it, considering the chaos nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope the stool doesn't give way; that would be a messy fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so focused on their sweet prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a stealthy pair, completely absorbed in their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR
